## üìñ Usage Notes

This design system was automatically extracted from the web page. CSS custom properties (variables) have been extracted and mapped to their computed values.

### Next Steps

1. Use the CSS variable names (e.g., `var(--medical-primary)`) in your code
2. Review and consolidate duplicate semantic names
3. Verify theme variants work correctly in light/dark modes
4. Integrate into your design system or component library
